text: Eighty-eight is a number. It comes between eighty-seven and eighty-nine, and is an even number. It is divisible by 1, 2, 4, 8, 11, 22, 44, and 88. In roman numerals (the way Romans write numbers) it is LXXXVIII. It is also a code used by Neo-Nazis to say "Heil Hitler" without saying it directly, as the 8th letter is H. Category:Integers
title: 88 (number)
